thread.title: Paul Pelletier

author: Paul Pelletier
title: Paul Pelletier
text:
My rep Riliy Nair was a really personable guy and tried his very best to help.
Unfortunately, I booked a trip to China, my forth with Travel one!
My round trip was a great fare, but got really burned on two one ways for the wife and child back from China( 1200.00) apiece). That really hurt, but had no choice but to eat it!
My round trip was 850.00, so you can see how ridicules the single fares were! Someone should be really embarrassed. The airlines I suspect!!
